name: openmanager-korean-nlp
description: Korean NLP Function - 한국어 자연어 처리 전문 Function

scripts.deploy: gcloud functions deploy korean-nlp --runtime nodejs22 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --memory 512MB --timeout 180s --region asia-northeast3
scripts.deploy:health: gcloud functions deploy korean-nlp-health --runtime nodejs22 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --memory 128MB --timeout 10s --region asia-northeast3
scripts.logs: gcloud functions logs read korean-nlp --region asia-northeast3
